thread.title: Vietnam Airlines to open Hai Phong-Nha Trang route
thread.title_full: SGGP English Edition- Vietnam Airlines to open Hai Phong-Nha Trang route

author: Minh Duy â€“ Translated by Kim Khanh
title: Vietnam Airlines to open Hai Phong-Nha Trang route
text:
The national carrier Vietnam Airlines will offer a new air route between the northern port city of Hai Phong and the central coastal city of Nha Trang since November 15.
The new service will be operational with four round flights per week on every Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Sunday, using Airbus A321.
The flight will be scheduled to take off at 8:20am from Nha Trang city in Khanh Hoa province and 10:50am from Hai Phong. The trip will take approximately 1 hour 45 minutes.
On the occasion, the airlines has launched a promotional program from October 21 to December 15 with one-way ticket fare for the route costing from 799,000 VND (35.9 USD) to 3 million VND (135 USD).
The special price will be applied for flight schedules from November 15 to December 15 this year. The fares exclude taxes and additional fees
